analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0xe292a41db000414d5bc7c1d1607cb39c1613f4e4.sol:
	Contract inerexToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0xe292a41db000414d5bc7c1d1607cb39c1613f4e4.sol#310)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0xe292a41db000414d5bc7c1d1607cb39c1613f4e4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/5/0xe292a41db000414d5bc7c1d1607cb39c1613f4e4.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/5/0xe292a41db000414d5bc7c1d1607cb39c1613f4e4.sol#115) is not in mixedCase
